Question: Shenzhen Freesun Technology Co. ,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Freesun Technology Co.,Ltd

Android Video Devices Solution Since 2011

- Manufacturer and trading combo in android tv box and Android Smart DLP & LCD Projector
- Products meet CE, RoHS and FCC standards
- Two times test and one time burning test for quality assurance
- Exhibits at global tech fairs such as CES
- Specialized in developing Smart projector, Smart tablet projector, Mini projector, Smart LED projector, HD media players, Android TV boxes, Smart TV boxes, Android media players, OTT boxes, and Virtual Reality (VR) products
